thread.title: Manchester United named the most expensive bench in FA Cup history against Blackburn
thread.title_full: Manchester United named the most expensive bench in FA Cup history against Blackburn

title: Manchester United named the most expensive bench in FA Cup history against Blackburn
text:
1 of 8 Man United named the most expensive bench in FA Cup history against Blackburn 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic stepped off the bench as a second-half substitute to hit the winner at Ewood Park after Marcus Rashford cancelled out Danny Graham's opener. 
Record signing Paul Pogba and £37m midfielder Juan Mata were also introduced as Mourinho called on the big guns to see off the Championship strugglers. 
However, there was still £66.5m-worth of talent left wrapped up in their tracksuits as the Red Devils named the most expensive collection of substitutes in FA Cup history. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see how United's star-studded bench looked during their Fifth Round clash with Blackburn Rovers. Related articles
